mapper.select: SELECT r.*, p.name as position_name, d.name as department_name FROM recruitment r LEFT JOIN position p ON r.position_id = p.id LEFT JOIN department d ON r.department_id = d.id WHERE r.id = #{id}

SELECT r.*, p.name as position_name, d.name as department_name FROM recruitment r LEFT JOIN position p ON r.position_id = p.id LEFT JOIN department d ON r.department_id = d.id WHERE r.status = 'open' ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruitment (position_id, department_id, count, salary_range, requirements, status, create_time) VALUES (#{positionId}, #{departmentId}, #{count}, #{salaryRange}, #{requirements}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recruitment WHERE status = #{status}
